description.line1: Free to use after logging in.
description.line2: Connect easily via the dedicated page ※1 and experience a speed-limited environment ※2.
description.line3: Secure communication enabled by advanced encryption.

guideLink.prefix: You can check how to use it

GuidePage.installDescription: 128kVPN requires WireGuard. Download the app suitable for your device from the following links.
GuidePage.interfaceDescription1: After logging in, click the '+ New' button on the dashboard to create a WireGuard interface. Once created, it will look like this.
GuidePage.interfaceDescription2: There’s a button to display a QR code. Scan the displayed QR code with the WireGuard app. Follow the on-screen instructions to automatically add the interface.
GuidePage.interfaceDescription3: Turn on the toggle for the added interface to start the VPN connection.
GuidePage.phoneOnlyDescription1: Tap the download button to download the config file to your device. After downloading, open the WireGuard app, tap 'Add Tunnel' and select 'Import from file'. Select the downloaded config file to add the interface.
GuidePage.phoneOnlyDescription2: Turn on the toggle for the added interface to start the VPN connection.

Navbar.confirmLogout: Do you want to log out?

interfaceCreationModal.title: Create Interface
interfaceCreationModal.notice: Please delete interfaces that you no longer use.
interfaceCreationModal.warning: The created interface will be automatically deleted after 30 to 60 minutes.

interfaceDeletionModal.title: Delete Interface
interfaceDeletionModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete this interface?

AuthForm.forgotPasswordSentEmail2: Please check your inbox and click the link to reset your password.

AuthError.sessionLogoutFailed: Session logout failed. Please try again.

UserSettingsPage.deleteAccountWarning: If you delete your account, all your data will be lost and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to proceed?
UserSettingsPage.confirmDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your account?

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.intro: This Privacy Policy governs the handling of personal information for 128kVPN (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service'), which is provided free of charge.
PrivacyPolicyPage.infoCollectedIntro: The Service collects the following information:
PrivacyPolicyPage.emailAndPasswordDetail: Collected when users register and log in via Firebase. Passwords are securely managed by Firebase and are not directly obtained or retained by us.
PrivacyPolicyPage.userIdDetail: A unique ID (UID) issued by Firebase, used as an identifier within the VPN connection management. This ID alone cannot identify an individual.
PrivacyPolicyPage.vpnLogsDetail: Records of connection and disconnection operations are retained for a certain period. Only the date, time, and Firebase user ID are stored. No communication content is recorded.
PrivacyPolicyPage.analyticsDetail: To improve the service, Google Analytics is used for access analysis. Anonymous traffic data is collected via cookies.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section3Purpose1: To provide and operate the Service
PrivacyPolicyPage.section3Purpose2: To prevent unauthorized use and ensure security
PrivacyPolicyPage.section3Purpose3: To understand usage status and improve the Service
PrivacyPolicyPage.section4Intro: We will not provide users' personal information to third parties except in the following cases:
PrivacyPolicyPage.section4Case2: When disclosure is required by law
PrivacyPolicyPage.section4Note: Please refer to the respective privacy policies of external services such as Firebase and Google Analytics regarding their handling of personal information.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section5Content: Email addresses and passwords are managed by Firebase and are not viewed or held by us. VPN connection logs are managed with appropriate access restrictions in an SQLite database. No communication contents, IP addresses, or browsing history are recorded or stored.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section6Content: Users may request disclosure, correction, or deletion of their personal information. For such requests, please contact the above email address.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section7Content: We are not involved in the content of communications through this Service and do not guarantee the legality, accuracy, or safety of such content. We assume no responsibility for any actions taken by users through the Service.
PrivacyPolicyPage.section8Content: The content of this Privacy Policy may be changed as necessary. Any changes will be applied immediately upon posting on the Service.
